A

apply(Statement, Description) - Method in class com.btmatthews.junit.rules.LoggingRule
Apply the test rule by building a wrapper Statement that logs a messages before and after evaluating statement and if

C

com.btmatthews.junit.rules - package com.btmatthews.junit.rules
A collection of JUnit 4 rules.

L

LoggingRule - Class in com.btmatthews.junit.rules
This JUnit rule generates log messages to delineate the start and finish of a JUnit test case and also to note any exceptions that are thrown.
LoggingRule() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.junit.rules.LoggingRule
